Label.text: How you can help us
Label.name: headline
text
Label.text: We are continuously looking for new contributors to our project. This includes the following fields:

Label.name: text
Label.text: • Graphic artists (modelling buildings & units)

Label.name: text
Label.text: • Python developers (also see next page)

Label.name: text
Label.text: • Game designers (describing new mechanics)

Label.name: text
Label.text: • Playtesters & Bughunters (yes, this also helps!)

Label.name: text
Label.text: Visit our IRC channel #unknown-horizons on FreeNode to get in touch with the developers and we will be happy to answer all your questions!

Label.name: text
Label.text: You find information on how to get started at

Label.name: text
Label.text: Most developers are from Europe, so make sure to show a little patience. We read our channel logs and will always come back to you.

Label.name: text03
Label.text: Thanks for your contributions and see you soon!

Label.text: The FIFE and Unknown Horizons

Label.name: fife_and_uh_team_lbl2
Label.text: development teams
Current information
Label.name: headline
text
Label.text: We are accepted as mentoring organization for this year's Google Summer of Code.

Label.name: text
Label.text: This means that Google grants students stipends to work on improving Unknown Horizons and FIFE together with us!

Label.name: text
Label.text: So what do we further ask for?

Label.name: text
Label.text: There will be a lot of awesome progress, but we also need graphical content to reflect how far we got.

Label.name: text
Label.text: We currently miss building graphics for:

Label.name: text
Label.text: • our tavern

Label.name: text
Label.text: • an animated sugar field

Label.name: text
Label.text: and all buildings which we want to add this summer. Please help with creating great content!

Label.name: text
Label.text: You can also contribute by translating UH into your language or improving existing translations. Our pootle server is found here:

Label.name: text
Label.text: Ask us on IRC when starting a new translation.

Label.name: text04
Label.text: We look forward to achieving a lot this summer!
